Class GameState

java.lang.Object
State
GameState
public class GameState
extends State
This class is the game state of the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Background background
    This is the background of the game state.
    private InfoBar bar
    This is the information bar fo the game.
    private boolean collisionMonster
    This variable is initially false.
    private float collisionMX
    This is the player's x-coordinate at the time it collides the monster.
    private boolean collisionPowerup
    This variable is initially false.
    private float collisionPX
    This is the player's x-coordinate at the time it collides the power up.
    static MessageArea messages
    This is the Message Window.
    private java.util.LinkedList<Monster> monsters
    This is the list of all monsters in the game.
    (package private) Monster nextMonster
    The next monster based on the player's x-coordinate
    private boolean paused
    This variable is initially false.
    private Player player
    This is the current player of the game.
    private java.util.LinkedList<Powerup> powerups
    This is the list of all powerups in the game.
    (package private) Monster prevMonster
    The previous monster based on the player's x-coordinate

  • Field Details

    • player

      private Player player
      This is the current player of the game.

    • background

      private Background background
      This is the background of the game state.

    • bar

      private InfoBar bar
      This is the information bar fo the game.

    • monsters

      private java.util.LinkedList<Monster> monsters
      This is the list of all monsters in the game.

    • powerups

      private java.util.LinkedList<Powerup> powerups
      This is the list of all powerups in the game.

    • messages

      public static MessageArea messages
      This is the Message Window. It includes the messages that are the information about player moves.

    • collisionMonster

      private boolean collisionMonster
      This variable is initially false. It becomes true if the player collides the monster. When the monster is behind the player, its value will be false again.

    • collisionPowerup

      private boolean collisionPowerup
      This variable is initially false. It becomes true if the player collides the powerup. When the power up is behind the player, its value will be false again.

    • collisionMX

      private float collisionMX
      This is the player's x-coordinate at the time it collides the monster.

    • collisionPX

      private float collisionPX
      This is the player's x-coordinate at the time it collides the power up.

    • nextMonster

      Monster nextMonster
      The next monster based on the player's x-coordinate

    • prevMonster

      Monster prevMonster
      The previous monster based on the player's x-coordinate

    • paused

      private boolean paused
      This variable is initially false. It becomes true if the player presses the pause button.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState​(Game game)
      GameState Constructor
      Parameters:
      game - Game object of the current game

  • Method Details

    • update

      private void update()
      This function adds a new monster and a new power up into game.

    • tick

      public void tick()
      This function updates every field and controls the collisions. It also checks if the game is over.
      Specified by:
      tick in class State

    • getInput

      private void getInput()
      This function gets the mouse inputs.

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This function draws the images and strings required in the game state.
      Specified by:
      render in class State
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics object is used to draw

    • controlSuccessfulJump

      private void controlSuccessfulJump()
      This function checks whether the jump movement is successful. If the player jumps successfully, the player earns points.

    • controlMonsterCollision

      private void controlMonsterCollision()
      This function checks whether the player collides with a monster. If the player collides with a monster, the player loses a life.

    • collisionMonster

      private boolean collisionMonster()
      This function checks if the player collides with a monster.
      Returns:
      true if they collide or false if they do not collide

    • controlPowerupCollision

      private void controlPowerupCollision()
      This function checks whether the player collides with a power up. If the player collides with a power up, the player acquired the power up and the player's power factor increases.

    • collisionPowerup

      private int collisionPowerup()
      This function checks if the player collides with a powerup. It returns the type of acquired powerup but it returns -1 if there is no collision.
      Returns:
      the type of the acquired powerup

    • nextMonster

      private Monster nextMonster()
      This function finds the next monster according to player's position on the game
      Returns:
      the next monster for the player
